title: Stuffed Shells
steps: Cook shells until just al dente. Cool.
Brown beef with onion. Stir in half the marinara.
Mix ricotta, 1 cup mozzarella, Parmesan, eggs, parsley, Italian seasoning.
Fill shells with ricotta, place in dish. Top with meat sauce and remaining mozzarella.
Cover, bake at 350°F for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake 10 more minutes.
notes: Undercook shells so they don't tear.
